name: C:\OVER\MIND
description:
Warning:

while not aiming at horror, this game contains potentially disturbing imagery and themes, such as death, self-worth, identity, trans-humanism.

This game was made in 15 days for the Winter Newbies Special 2022.

C:\OVER\MIND

Follow Alexander Blackwood as he explores the Godcomplex, a mental institution built after the end of the world, meant to alleviate the sufferings of the souls of now-deceased people.  Look for Doctor Jacob Stedman: he will be the one to rid this world of misery.

This game is mainly driven by narration and dialogue, followed in a point-and-click fashion; the artstyle is inspired by the works of Giorgio De Chirico as well as dadaist photo collage.

If you ever find yourself stuck or frustrated, I wrote a walkthrough that you can follow to reach both endings.

The game features around 30m of content, including: 

  • Philosophical themes
  • Two separate endings
  • 8 collectible "gifts" needed to reach the best finale
  • Voice acting
  • Several puzzles
  • Jacob Stedman
